channel.title: cnc on Scott French
channel.description: Recent content in cnc on Scott French

item.title: The Handmade Question
item.description: The previous entry in this four part series found me reconnecting with the parts of lutherie that inspired me from the start and deciding to move forward with guitar building in ways I never considered. This entry is an extension of that reconsideration of all things held holy in guitar building. If you went back and looked at my first website from 2004, you'd see I put a lot of emphasis on my instruments being handmade.
